questions.question: When a person declares bankruptcy that fact will appear on the persons credit report

choices.answer: for a 3 year period
for a 10 year period
until the person repays all debts owed
until the person is able to receive a new credit card
Charge a fee for setting up a basic budget
Charge a fee for setting up a debt repayment plan
Charge a fee for helping manage consumers debts
Do not charge a fee for any of their services

questions.question: John has a college student loan he has to repay. He will make monthly payments. What type is it

choices.answer: Secured
Non-installment
Diversified
Installment

questions.question: Which of the following does the Federal Reserve use to regulate the nation's money supply?

choices.answer: Fiscal policy
Proposing legislation
Monetary policy
regulations

questions.question: Jami lost her debit card for 3 months. If someone used it, her maximum liability is

choices.answer: Unlimited Liability
No liability because she notified the financial institution

questions.question: A  student is looking @ finance as a career. which question should the student look @ first

choices.answer: will I find a balance between $ & satisfaction from work?
How many people do I know who work in the field?
Once I train for this area, how long before I am at the top?
Are  people in this field who are unhappy with their jobs?

questions.question: Money for saving, investing, or spending cannot be from:

choices.answer: An inheritance from someone who has not died
Discretionary income or a gift of money
Capital gains from a sale of stock
Capital losses from the sale of stock
